intro.title: Resume
intro.subtitle: More of my references.
intro.text: You will find below my main experiences as CTO / CPO or web engineer.

work1.title: Senior VP Product
work1.text:
Sport Heroes is a start-up that edits a SaaS product that allows more than 300 partners (brands, event organizers, NGOs, companies) to engage their community of customers, collaborators, or fans, using connected sports and well-being.
Management of the Product & Tech team (about 25 people: Product Managers / Designers, Engineering Managers, Developers, User Care) in agile squads. In charge of the roadmap, delivery and processes.
Stack: React / React Native, Node, Mongo, Redis, AWS.

work2.title: Head of Technology
work2.text:
909c is a social media agency, acquired by WNP in 2017.
Management of the technical team on various agency projects: planning, daily management, technical architecture.
Stack : Symfony, Wordpress, eZPublish, VueJS, ...

work3.title: Web engineer
work3.text:
- Web development front / mobile / back.
- Hosting.
- Consulting / training.
- Teacher / speaker at Paris-Est University.
Stack: Python / Django, Symfony, Wordpress, Angular, ...
